enterprises.name: MPower Ventures
enterprises.mission: Democratizing clean energy access across Africa through innovative solar solutions and micro-finance programs
enterprises.description: Swiss-founded social enterprise providing affordable solar energy solutions to rural communities across Africa. Since 2019, MPower has installed over 2,500 solar systems, bringing clean electricity to more than 12,000 people in Kenya, Uganda, and Tanzania.
enterprises.problem: Over 600 million people in sub-Saharan Africa lack access to electricity, forcing reliance on expensive, polluting kerosene lamps and diesel generators.
enterprises.solution: MPower provides affordable, high-quality solar home systems through flexible payment plans, local training programs, and ongoing technical support.

testimonial.quote: MPower's solar system changed our children's education. Now they can study at night and we save money on kerosene.
testimonial.author: Margaret Wanjiku

donation_tiers.impact: Powers LED lights for 1 family for 3 months
Covers solar installation training for 1 local technician
Provides complete solar lighting system for 1 household
Funds solar system for small business (shop/clinic)

enterprises.name: Mandulis Energy
enterprises.mission: Converting agricultural waste into clean cooking fuel and sustainable energy for rural African communities
enterprises.description: Uganda-based social enterprise transforming agricultural waste into clean, affordable cooking solutions. Mandulis converts rice husks, coffee husks, and other farm waste into high-quality briquettes, providing clean cooking fuel while creating income for rural farmers.
enterprises.problem: Rural families in Uganda spend hours collecting firewood and suffer from indoor air pollution. Agricultural waste is often burned or discarded, contributing to environmental degradation.
enterprises.solution: Mandulis collects agricultural waste from farmers, converts it into clean-burning briquettes, and sells affordable cooking fuel while providing farmers additional income.
achievements: 85% reduction in cooking fuel costs for families

testimonial.quote: Selling rice husks to Mandulis gives me extra income and helps my community get clean cooking fuel. It's a win-win.
testimonial.author: Joseph Kigozi

donation_tiers.impact: Provides clean cooking fuel for 1 family for 1 month
Covers waste collection from 5 farmers
Funds briquette production equipment maintenance
Establishes waste collection point in new village

enterprises.name: Openversum
enterprises.mission: Developing open-source water technology solutions for sustainable access to clean water worldwide
enterprises.description: Swiss-based social enterprise creating innovative, open-source water purification and monitoring technologies. Openversum's solutions provide real-time water quality data and affordable purification systems for communities and organizations globally.
enterprises.problem: 2 billion people lack access to safely managed drinking water, and many water systems fail due to lack of monitoring and maintenance.
enterprises.solution: Openversum provides open-source water monitoring sensors, purification systems, and training programs that communities can maintain and scale independently.
achievements: 2.5 million liters clean water produced daily

testimonial.quote: Openversum's water monitoring system helps us ensure our community always has safe drinking water. The training empowered us to maintain it ourselves.
testimonial.author: Dr. Priya Sharma

donation_tiers.impact: Funds water quality testing for 1 community for 1 month
Provides water monitoring sensor replacement parts
Covers training workshop for 10 community members
Funds complete water monitoring system for new site

enterprises.name: Ignis Careers
enterprises.mission: Bridging the skills gap for underserved youth in India through practical career training and job placement programs
enterprises.description: India-focused social enterprise providing career-oriented training programs for youth from underserved communities. Ignis Careers offers industry-relevant skills training, mentorship, and direct job placement in sectors including technology, hospitality, and manufacturing.
enterprises.problem: Millions of Indian youth lack access to practical skills training, resulting in high unemployment despite growing job opportunities in various sectors.
enterprises.solution: Ignis provides 3-6 month intensive training programs combining technical skills, soft skills, and direct industry mentorship, followed by guaranteed job placement support.

testimonial.quote: Ignis Careers changed my life. I went from earning ‚Çπ8,000 to ‚Çπ25,000 per month after their IT training program. Now I can support my family.
testimonial.author: Rahul Kumar

donation_tiers.impact: Covers 1 week of training for 1 student
Provides complete skills assessment and career guidance
Funds 1 month training program for 1 student
Sponsors complete 3-month program including job placement

enterprises.name: Vision Friend Sakib Gore
enterprises.mission: Providing affordable eye care and vision correction to underserved communities worldwide
enterprises.description: Global social enterprise led by Sakib Gore, focused on eliminating preventable blindness through accessible eye care services. Vision Friend operates mobile clinics and training programs, bringing professional eye care to remote and underserved areas.
enterprises.problem: Over 2.2 billion people worldwide have vision impairment, with 1 billion cases being preventable or untreated. Rural communities often lack access to basic eye care services.
enterprises.solution: Vision Friend provides mobile eye clinics, trains local healthcare workers, and establishes sustainable eye care programs that communities can maintain long-term.
achievements: 85+ rural communities now have eye care access

testimonial.quote: I couldn't see my granddaughter's face clearly for 3 years. After Vision Friend's free cataract surgery, I can see her smile again.
testimonial.author: Fatima Al-Rashid

donation_tiers.impact: Funds eye screening for 10 people
Provides 1 pair of prescription glasses
Covers 1 sight-restoring cataract surgery
Funds mobile clinic visit to 1 remote village

enterprises.name: Syangs
enterprises.mission: Revitalizing traditional Himalayan agriculture and empowering indigenous farmers through sustainable farming practices
enterprises.description: Community-led social enterprise in Darjeeling, India, working with indigenous farmers to preserve traditional crops, implement sustainable farming techniques, and create fair market access for Himalayan agricultural products including traditional grains, vegetables, and medicinal plants.
enterprises.problem: Climate change and market pressures force Himalayan farmers to abandon traditional crops and sustainable practices, threatening food security and cultural heritage.
enterprises.solution: Syangs helps farmers transition to organic methods, preserve indigenous seeds, and connect directly with conscious consumers who value traditional, sustainably-grown food.
achievements: 40% average income increase for participating farmers

testimonial.quote: Syangs helped me grow traditional finger millet again. My grandfather's seeds are feeding my family and earning good income through fair trade.
testimonial.author: Pemba Sherpa

donation_tiers.impact: Provides organic seed kit for 1 farmer
Funds sustainable farming training workshop
Supports 1 farmer's transition to organic for 1 season
Establishes seed bank for traditional varieties
